description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b, line 12. Physical description: 21 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Some staining and smudging. Origin: According to note on leaf 1a, this copy is a holograph. Incipit: الحمد لله فياض عوارف المعارف
author: Nirāqī, ʻAbd al-Ṣāḥib Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, -1873?
extent: 118 leaves : paper ; 218 x 152 (155 x 92) mm bound to 221 x 157 mm
title: Mashāriq al-aḥkām.
creator: نراقي، عبد الصاحب محمد بن احمد، -1873?
subject: Islamic law
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
